description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. What path will you take?  What lies behind the door you wish to open?  Something basic or elaborate?  Something refreshing or unforgiving?  Completely new or familiar?  Or something completely off the wall?  With no two excursions exactly alike, you'll never know exactly what lies ahead.  There only remains one question: are you Feelin' Lucky, Punk?
